[vc_row][vc_column]

Pharmaceutical IV Bottle

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

→ Brief Introduction

[vc_column_text]MG-PP series stretch blow molding machine is dedicated to the production of pharmaceutical packaging and high temperature hot-fillable heat resistant IV bottles. Today PP is used widely for pharmaceutical packaging, where PP’s chemical resistance and suitability for steam sterilization prove a winning combination. At WASHUN Machinery, after two-years’ testing on PP, the second generation of PP stretch blow molding machine is presented. According to the properties of PP material, the specialized preform oven makes sure of the quality when shaping bottles.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4368″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

BOPP IV Bottle Samples

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Applications
Pharmaceutical IV Bottle, Milk, isotonic drinks, teas and coffees, soy sauce …
Advantages
Stand hot temperature filling
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

→ Remark

[vc_column_text]Reheat stretch blow molding machine for Pharmaceutical IV Bottle, is also called two stage stretch blow molding machine for BOPP transfusion Bottle and PET bottle blowing machine for BOPP IV bottles .[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]WASHUN Machinery, the Professional blow molding equipments supplier in China.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

→ Related Blow Molding Machines:

[vc_column_text]– MG-PP Stretch Blow Molding Machine
– EB electric stretch blow molding machine[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
